Articles.Content:
Got this CPU in a Laptop (main use not KSP/gaming), just wondering if anyone has used this for some light gaming +/ how well it runs KSP.

Cheers!

http://ark.intel.com/products/81016/Intel-Core-i5-4210U-Processor-3M-Cache-up-to-2_70-GHz?q=Intel%C2%AE%20Core%E2%84%A2%20i5-4210U%20Processor%20%283M%20Cache,%20up%20to%202.70%20GHz%29

It'll probably run KSP fine, but I wouldn't expect anything particularly spectacular.
Oh i know it would run, that's a given - just wondered if anyone had any experience with it. Thanks. :-)
